title: Star Force: Gemini
description: The trainees come to the final stage of their training before graduation, the 'Tandem Challenges,' during which the top team and individual honors will be determined, with Paul and Morgan racing each other to collect as many points as possible before they arrive at the 'Final Challenge.'"Gemini" is the 5th episode in the series.Word Count: 25,500
author: Aer-ki Jyr
